meaning_str.bing:
n. 混合；结合体；混合物；集合体
网络. 合剂；混合剂；混合体

混合；结合体；混合物；集合体

混合物；混合；混合剂；掺和物；混合料；混合状态；混合音；多样化组合

1.en: But we've just figured it out our expressions for mu A and mu B, our chemical potentials of each constituent in the ideal liquid mixture.
1.cn: 但我们刚刚计算出，μA和μB的表达式，在理想液体混合物中，每种组分的化学势。

2.en: Remorse is a mixture of good will and bad faith: a sincere desire to close old wounds and a secret wish to be left alone.
2.cn: 悔恨是善意与恶意的混合体，一方面真心希望能愈合过去的伤口，另一方面，又暗自希望能独处。

3.en: I'm on this point here, I keep my solution, my mixture. I make a gas, I read off the composition of the gas phase here.
3.cn: 我在这个点，保持溶液混合物，然后进行汽化，在这里读出气相的成分比例。

0.en: Then just give this mixture a good mix. Stir this mixture in the same direction and it helps cause it helps to bind all the ingredients together and it does to aerate the meatballs so they're lovely and bouncy.
0.cn: 然后将所有原料混合均匀，向同一个方向搅拌，这样有助于将原料粘到一起，还能为肉丸融入空气，使之可口有弹性。

1.en: Daddy, Mummy. There's no more bubble mixture.
1.cn: 爸爸，妈妈！泡泡器吹不出泡泡啦！

2.en: While the butter mixture melts, blend together the other ingredients.
2.cn: 当奶油融化时，加入其他的原料搅拌一下。

3.en: Peppa, if you like bubbles, why don't you play with your bubble mixture? Yes. My bubble mixture.
3.cn: 佩奇，既然你喜欢吹泡泡，不如你们来玩泡泡器？是的，玩我的泡泡器。

4.en: Now watch this. Daddy Pig has made his own bubble mixture.
4.cn: 现在，仔细看好了。猪爸爸自己做了一个泡泡器。

5.en: I love bubbles. Oh, dear. The bubble mixture is all used up.
5.cn: 我好喜欢泡泡！噢糟糕，泡泡器里面都空啦。

6.en: First, dip the stick in the mixture. Then, take a big breath and blow. Bubble.
6.cn: 第一步，先把棍子在里面沾一沾。接着，吸好大一口气，再吹出气。泡泡。

7.en: Oh dear. I've spilled all my bubble mixture. Now, we can't make any more bubbles.
7.cn: 噢糟糕，看来这个泡泡器也不能用了。所以我们现在吹不了泡泡了！

8.en: No, we're a chemical mixture that makes chaos. We're a time bomb. You need to step away.
8.cn: 不不，我们混在一起只会制造混乱，就像定时炸弹一样。你应该冷静一下。

9.en: Now I'm going to add my water. And get a bit of a spoon in there to turn this mixture together.
9.cn: 现在要加入水倒入几勺水，把它和在一起。

10.en: George, now it's your turn. Dip the stick in the mixture, hold it up, take a big breath, and blow.
10.cn: 乔治，现在该你吹了！先把棍子在里面沾一沾，拿起来，吸一口气，再吹出气！

11.en: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles. Look. The bubble mixture has made the puddle all bubbly.
11.cn: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑跳来跳去！瞧！泡泡器让泥坑也能冒出好多泡泡来了。

12.en: I know a way George can make bubbles. Dip the stick in the mixture, then lift it up and wave it around. Bubble.
12.cn: 我知道怎么让乔治可以吹泡泡。先把棍子拿起来 沾一沾，再向四周挥一挥。泡泡！

13.en: But we can play jumping in muddy puddles. Look. Daddy Pig's bubble mixture has made a big muddy puddle. Hurray.
13.cn: 但是我们可以在坭坑里跳来跳去了！猪爸爸的泡泡器在地上弄了一个大泥坑！好嘞！

14.en: The mixture has cooled for about 20 minutes, and the smell as the dark warm liquid hits the bowl is really lovely, malty and rich.
14.cn: 已经冷却20分钟了，当温温的液体流到碗里时，味道真的是好极了，麦芽糖的味道，很丰富。

15.en: Maybe a potato with jelly, and cheese, and strawberry jam, please. A potato with jelly, cheese, and strawberry jam? What a funny mixture of food.
15.cn: 配上一点果冻，一点奶酪还有一点草莓酱。土豆加上果冻，奶酪还有草莓酱？这种搭配方法真奇怪！

16.en: I can hear my butter, which is all melted together but you'll leave that to cool, because if you put a hot mixture on this, it will kill the yeast instantly.
16.cn: 我能听到黄油的声音，正在融为一体，但是你得让它冷却，因为如果你把这么热的东西放在上面，就会立即把酵母杀死。

17.en: Peppa and George love chocolate cake mixture. Poor Daddy Pig, he's missing all the fun. Mummy, can I ring Daddy work and say happy birthday? That's a nice idea.
17.cn: 佩奇和乔治喜欢巧克力的味道。可怜的猪爸爸，错过了所有好玩的东西。妈妈我能打电话给爸爸吗？跟他说生日快乐？这真是个不错的主意。

18.en: Peppa and George love chocolate cake mixture. Poor Daddy Pig, he's missing all the fun. Mummy, can I ring Daddy work and say happy birthday? That's a nice idea.
18.cn: 佩奇和乔治喜欢巧克力的味道。可怜的猪爸爸，错过了所有好玩的东西。妈妈我能打电话给爸爸吗？跟他说生日快乐？这真是个不错的主意。

19.en: And you can see the meat is all lovely and tenderized. Now I'm going to make these into meatballs, so a good trick is to wet your hands, because that means that the meat mixture doesn't stick to your hands when you're moulding them.
19.cn: 现在我要把它们做成肉丸，有个窍门就是把手润湿，因为这样在你捏肉丸时肉就不会沾在手上了。
